name: Floating scoll to top
tagline: Animated Scoll To Top and Barcode.
body: # Floating Scoll To Top ## Check the demo.html in the zip. A jQuery based floating bar containing a scroll to top button and a barcode that will auto appear (or hide) when scroll down (or up) the page. More Amazing jQuery Plugins Original Author: http://www.jq-school.com/Detail.aspx?id=332
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
